CustomField.description: Used to transfer the billing email to the invoice
CustomField.formula: IF( Bulk_Invoicing__c = TRUE, IF( ISBLANK(Account.Parent.Parent.Billing_Email__c), Account.Parent.Billing_Email__c, Account.Parent.Parent.Billing_Email__c ), Billing_Email__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to transfer the billing email to the invoice
CustomField.label: JustOn: Email
